message: There's a part of me that can't quite believe it's realtime.
I *really* like the low-impact notifier along the top.
Have you guys thought about signing new users up for "Feedback" immediately? And maybe some sort of "Introduce Yourself" group as well?
yeah, definitely add some medium/high-volume groups by default
I just love how simple it is to jump around different conversations
did you say low-impact? Or paranoia-inducing everything-must-always-be-read OCD inflamer?
I kind of like how I dropped in at the deep end to discover or create stuff, but I can imagine some users would find it handy to be signed up to something to start off.
